title: Student explanation for classmate failing grade

content.question: According to the fundamental attribution error, which of the following is most likely to be a student’s explanation for a classmate’s failing exam grade?

choices.label: The classmate was too lazy to study hard.
There were too many picky questions on the exam.
The classmate missed class too often.
The classmate had no quiet place to study.

content.answer: The classmate was too lazy to study hard.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
